text:
Virtulus (http://www.virtulus.com/) - Boston, but welcome Bay Area candidates since we may consider moving there.

Location-based, mobile graph search engine founded by 2 MIT grads. Looking for database architects with industry experience (preferably on neo4j or titan, elasticsearch, mongodb), software engineers (python stack), and an iOS developer.

Send questions, or resume + github URL + project links to jobs@virtulus.com
